nbastatR
  • Reference

Franchise leaders

Gets franchise leader information for by specified input for specific teams

get_teams_franchise_leaders(teams = NULL, all_teams = FALSE,
  remove_inactive_teams = F, modes = "Totals",
  season_types = c("Regular Season"), return_message = TRUE,
  nest_data = FALSE)

Arguments

teams

vector of team names
all_teams

if TRUE returns all teams
remove_inactive_teams

if TRUE removes inactive teams
modes

mode of search

  • Totals

  • Per Game
season_types

type of season

  • Regular Season

  • Playoffs

  • Pre Season

'

Value

a data_frame

See also

Other teams: get_drafts, get_seasons_rosters, get_teams_players_seasons_summary_stats, get_teams_seasons_rankings

Other leaders: get_seasons_metrics_league_leaders

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_teams_franchise_leaders(teams = "Brooklyn Nets", modes = c("Totals"))
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • See also
  • Examples
